metadata.name: Potential Credential Dumping Via LSASS Process Clone
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious LSASS process process clone that could be a sign of credential dumping activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\windows\\system32\\lsass.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\windows\\system32\\lsass.exe')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious LSASS process process clone that could be a sign of credential dumping activity
